text: William Wood (born 28 December 1927) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:People from Barnsley Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Hull City A.F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Wisbech Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Possibly living people
title: Bill Wood (footballer, born 1927)
